turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a couple of drinks at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. The closest available Starbucks located to you is Durango and Farm at Las Vegas, NV. Is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a vanilla latte, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to substitute the 2% milk with something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'd like it with almond milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ordering one grande vanilla latte with almond milk. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd also like to order a caramel frappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Adding one grande caramel frappuccino to your order. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can I also get a chocolate croissant?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Adding one chocolate croissant to your order. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order consists of one grande vanilla latte with almond milk, one caramel frappuccino, and a chocolate croissant. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been confirmed and will be ready for pickup shortly. Your receipt will be sent to you through your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!
